content.text: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, skin removed and cut into pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-12 "1 (3 pound) whole chicken, skin removed and cut into pieces" )
( ing-20 "1/4 teaspoon powdered yellow food coloring" )

content.text: 0) Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the olive oil"@8:21 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@25:40 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@46:57 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Mix in the yogurt and vinegar.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the yogurt"@10:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "vinegar"@25:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place the onion in the skillet, and cook until tender.
3) Mix in the garlic, ginger paste, green chile peppers, and tomatoes.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the garlic"@10:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "ginger paste"@22:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "green chile peppers"@36:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "tomatoes"@61:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Cook and stir until tomatoes are tender.
5) Season with garam masala, mint, salt, and pepper, and mix in the cilantro.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "garam masala"@15:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "mint"@29:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "salt, and pepper"@35:51 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "mix in"@57:63 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "the cilantro"@64:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Place the chicken in the skillet.
7) Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and continue cooking 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until chicken juices run clear.
8) Bring the water and rice to a boil in a large pot.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "boil"@33:37 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-14 "rice"@23:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "the water"@9:18 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "a large pot"@41:52 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Mix in the bay leaf, green cardamom, black cardamom, and cinnamon.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Mix in"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-15 "the bay leaf"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-16 "green cardamom"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-17 "black cardamom"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-18 "cinnamon"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Season"@4:10 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-19 "salt"@16:20 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-10-0 "to taste"@21:29 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 20 minutes.
12) In a separate pot, alternate the rice and chicken mixture in layers, topping with rice.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "alternate"@23:32 / AC
		:ppt ( "the rice"@33:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "chicken mixture"@46:61 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-12-0 "a separate pot"@7:21 / TOOL )
		:todo ( "layers"@65:71 / OTHER )
	)
	:inform ( ac-12-1 "topping"@73:80 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "rice"@86:90 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 13) Sprinkle with the food coloring, and mix to serve.
